name: A round gray stone
data: It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It gives small bonus to the skill 'pick pockets'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'pick locks'.
Please spare a thought for Old Man Jest,
He thought it might be in his interest
But on one of thieving trips of night,
A door that caused him too much plight
and fell him on the floor.
Please spare a thought for Old Man Jest,
In this stone, this thieve's nest;
